name: Plan C - Organic Muscle Mass Gain

Breakfast.details: High-Protein Organic Breakfast Bowl: 1 cup organic steel-cut oats, 2 organic whole eggs, 2 organic egg whites, 1 scoop organic whey protein powder, 1 organic banana, 2 tbsp organic almond butter, 1 tbsp organic honey
Breakfast.instructions: Cook oats, mix in protein powder. Scramble eggs separately. Combine all ingredients in a bowl.

Mid-Morning Snack.details: Organic Protein-Packed Smoothie: 1 cup organic whole milk, 1 scoop organic whey protein powder, 1 organic banana, 1/2 cup organic mixed berries, 2 tbsp organic peanut butter, 1 tbsp organic chia seeds

Lunch.details: Organic Quinoa Chicken Bowl: 6 oz organic grilled chicken breast, 1 cup cooked organic quinoa, 1 cup organic roasted vegetables (broccoli, sweet potato, bell peppers), 1/4 organic avocado, 2 tbsp organic olive oil
Lunch.instructions: Grill chicken, roast vegetables. Combine all ingredients in a bowl and drizzle with olive oil.

Pre-Workout Snack.details: Organic Energy Boost: 1 organic apple, 2 tbsp organic almond butter, 1/4 cup organic granola
Pre-Workout Snack.instructions: Slice apple and serve with almond butter. Top with granola.

Post-Workout Snack.details: Organic Recovery Shake: 1.5 scoops organic whey protein powder, 1 cup organic whole milk, 1 organic banana, 1 tbsp organic honey, 1/4 cup organic rolled oats

Dinner.details: Organic Protein-Packed Plate: 8 oz organic grass-fed steak, 1 cup organic brown rice, 1.5 cups organic steamed vegetables (broccoli, carrots, green beans), 1 tbsp organic grass-fed butter
Dinner.instructions: Grill steak to desired doneness. Serve with brown rice and steamed vegetables. Top vegetables with butter.

Evening Snack.details: Organic Cottage Cheese Muscle Builder: 1 cup organic cottage cheese, 1/4 cup organic walnuts, 1 tbsp organic flaxseeds, 1/2 cup organic mixed berries
Evening Snack.instructions: Mix cottage cheese with walnuts and flaxseeds. Top with mixed berries.
